WEBP to PNG Converter

Convert WEBP images to PNG format instantly in your browser. No uploads to servers - your files stay private and secure.

How to Use

Select a WEBP image file and click Convert. Your PNG image will be ready for download.

Runs locally — no uploads. Your images never leave your device.

Drop an image here or

Selected file: ()

How this converter works

This tool uses your browser's canvas to convert WEBP to PNG. All processing happens locally without uploading to any server.
